text: Patrizia Barbieri (born 8 May 1960) is an Italian politician. Barbieri was born in Cremona, Italy. In June 2017, she was elected as Mayor of Piacenza. In 2018, she was elected to Province of Piacenza. On 4 March 2020 she announced she had tested positive for SARS-CoV-2. == References == Category:Living people Category:1960 births Category:Politicians from Lombardy Category:People from Cremona
title: Patrizia Barbieri
